scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules dist && pnpm run printSuccess
scripts.build: pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm run check && tsc && pnpm run test && pnpm run osImageBuild && pnpm run printSuccess
scripts.osImageBuild: pnpm prune --prod && podman build -t $npm_package_name:latest . && podman save -o dist/os-image.tar $npm_package_name:latest && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile
